createTokenRewards(address,address,addre.details: used for extra incentive tokens(ex. snx) as well as vebal fees

params._mainRewards: address of the main reward pool contract
params._rewardPoolOwner: address of the reward pool owner

returns._0: address of the new reward pool

grantRewardStashAccess(address).details: Stash contracts need access to create new Virtual balance pools for extra gauge incentives(ex. snx)

params._reward: The address of the reward contract

addActiveReward(address,uint256).notice: Adds a new reward to the active list

createTokenRewards(address,address,addre.notice: Create a virtual balance reward pool that mimicks the balance of a pool's main reward contract
